situation.title: Home office - bussiness
situation.meta_description: The government calls upon all employers for whom the nature of their work and the operating conditions allow to agree with their employees to work from home (home office).

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

The government calls upon all employers for whom the nature of their work and the operating conditions allow to agree with their employees to work from home. It also recommends supporting holidays and paid leave for employees, or other instruments specified in the collective agreement. It also calls for restrictions on the performance of work that is not important for maintaining the employer's activities. The workplace is one of the most common places of infection, as there is a large concentration of people from different backgrounds for a long period of time.

Work from home is an effective tool to prevent mixing of people with a high risk of infection. If possible, stay home and work from there. The government has instructed all employers to agree with all employees on working remotely if possible.

questions_answers.question: Can an employer order home office to his employees?
questions_answers.value: No, the employee must always agree to work from home.

questions_answers.question: Who determines the employees working hours when on home office?
questions_answers.value: Employer. However, it is possible to agree on a more flexible working hours.

questions_answers.question: What about health and safety during home office?
questions_answers.value: The employee should follow the same health and safety rules as at the employer's workplace.

questions_answers.question: Is it possible to order overtime or on-call duty at the home office?
questions_answers.value: Yes, provided that the working hours are scheduled by the employer.

questions_answers.question: Do I get the same salary when on home office as if I were working at the employer's workplace?
questions_answers.value: Yes. In addition, you can claim reimbursement for the cost of work from home.
